package.name: acdk_tcl
package.title: ACDK Tcl Library
package.shortdescription: acdk_tcl_dll enables to embed Tcl scripting code into your ACDK application.
package.description: With the library acdk_tcl_dll you can use Tcl as scripting language in your ACDK project. You also can instrument ACDK classes with the %ref[DMI, glos_dmi] interface.
package.todo: Nothing at the moment. Better Doc.
